content.body: I noticed that the "Note", "Example", "1.", and "2." cannot be highlighted, which means the AI will not consider them when interacting with the highlighted paragraph. Is there a way to modify this behavior from your side, or do I need to do something from my side?
No problem. Yourv question reminded me about it, so I'll try to get it done over the quiet break here.
